title: Hunt for Georgia mother who went missing two days ago with daughter, five, and three-year-old son
text:
Police in Georgia are desperately looking for a mother who went missing two days ago with her young children.

Latoya Monique Boyer was last seen in Woodstock on Sunday afternoon, accompanied by her five-year-old daughter and three-year-old son.

Cops say Boyer was traveling in a 2013 silver Chrysler Town and Country van at around 3pm but it's unclear where she was headed.

Latoya Monique Boyer was last seen in Woodstock, Georgia on Sunday. Kennesaw Police Department asked the public for help finding her on Monday in a missing person poster (right)

The vehicle has a Georgia tag TBC030. It has not been made public who reported Boyer missing but friends have posted on social media about their concern.

Kennesaw Police Department told the public about her disappearance in a social media post on Monday, which began: 'We need your help!'

The image posted with the missing person alert shows Boyer - an African American woman – and prompted several responses from parents who know her from a day care she worked at.

Social media users described the mother as 'so sweet' and 'beautiful'

'Omg she was one of my son's daycare teachers a few years ago. Prayers she is found safe!,' one woman commented. Another added: 'Me too!! Love her so!'

Boyer was traveling with her five-year-old daughter and three-year-old son but it's unclear where they were headed

Another concerned member of the community said she saw a woman that looked like Boyer before she saw the missing person poster. However the person spotted did not have children in her company.

'It may not have been her, but I just saw a lady that looked a lot like her in ingles on 113 in Cartersville. But there were no kids with her,' the Facebook user commented to police.

'Again, it may not have been her and I would assume more than likely that it probably wasn't. But as I was scrolling across Facebook and her picture came across my screen I felt like it looked a lot like the girl I just saw in ingles before I even saw that she was missing.'

If you know the whereabouts of Latoya Monique Boyer and her children, please contact the Kennesaw Police Department at 770-422-2505.
description: Latoya Monique Boyer was last seen driving a silver Chrysler Town and Country van in Woodstock, Georgia on Sunday at 3pm with her children and the  Kennesaw community prayed for her return.
